text: Hi Jon, do you mind messaging me a link to look take a look at this template?

This caused a similar issue and another HS dev figured out what the problem was:
The problem - at the domain level someone added setup-style.css as a domain stylesheet.

I didnâ€™t know about this as I was building templates with domain stylesheets disabled.

When you try copying a module over it will automatically treat all domain stylesheets as required by the module.

The other HS dev was focused on fixing the issue for the design previewer(not for the cloning to another site)
Ah hah! I had a feeling that it was a domain-connected stylesheet. Do you mind direct-messaging me the module in question?
